name: Raider

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally SPD in Faction Crypts by 13%

skills.name: Savagery
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Attacks 2 times if the target's HP percentage is higher than this Champion's.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +5%

skills.name: Carnage
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies. Has a 25% chance of placing a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 6 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.name: Dominate
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 60% chance of placing a [Stun] debuff for 2 turns. Also has a 60% chance of placing a 30% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +20%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +20%

faction.name: Orcs
faction.default_description: Orcs is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 31 champions

seo.title: %%title%% %%page%% %%sep%% %%parent_title%% %%sep%% %%sitename%%
seo.description: Orcs is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 24 champions. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

faction.raw_description: Orcish tribes maintain a tenuous hold in pockets from Durham Forest to the Deadlands. Initially bred as warrior slaves, Orcs do what they must to ensure their survival, and will pick off unwitting travelers for their coin, blood and bones. Fearful of persecution by the men of Kaerok, they have sided with the Queen of Aravia.

seo.title: %%title%% %%page%% %%sep%% %%parent_title%% %%sep%% %%sitename%%
seo.description: Raider is a rare attack champion from the faction Orcs doing spirit damage. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

structured_data.description: Member of the faction Orcs, Raider is a champion of Rare rarity and of Attack type
structured_data.name: Raider

default_description: Raider is a rare attack champion from the faction Orcs doing spirit damage
